message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100. It's a great deal, if I do say so myself!
Thanks for the offer Alice! I appreciate it, but I'm looking to spend a little less. Would you consider $90?

Thanks for your offer, Bob! I understand you're looking to spend a bit less, but I'm not willing to go that low just yet. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $95. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product!
